entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate improving JIT heuristics with machine learning #92915
    9.0.0
  • Understand and improve ConfigurationBinder Source Generator incremental behavior #92914
    8.0.0
  • Support dsym bundles in symbol packages/indexing #92911
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: Blazor tests on windows failing with `Failed to bind to address` for random ports #92910
  • Name of WebAssembly tools in VS setup doesn't deliniate what a versionless description is #92907
  • Consider using memfd_create instead of shm_open in MemoryMappedFile if it's available #92905
    9.0.0
  • dotnet trace convert causes a crash on s390x #92891
  • [browser] Rollup removes `webpackIgnore` comments in release builds #92888
    9.0.0
  • Excessive zero extension #92887
    9.0.0
  • [browser] TensorPrimitivesTests.ConvertToHalf_SpecialValues `-Infinity` #92885
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Baseservices runtime tests failed in Mono fullAOT llvm job #92883
    9.0.0
  • Implement real fix for C5271 in IJW test build #92879
  • JsonObjectCreationHandling.Populate not working with parameterized constructors #92877
    8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Zero SIMD vectors with movi on arm64 #92873
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Unit tests for generated code in JSInterop #92870
    9.0.0
  • Native AOT `StackFrame` method info #92869
  • JIT Arm64: Incorrectly optimizes out narrowing #92865
    8.0.0

Closed

  • NativeAOT Checked smoke tests are taking a long time #91296
  • Test failure: Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #92236
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 AOT Mac OSX x64 segmentation fault #92894
    8.0.0
  • icudt_EFIGS.dat blocked by firewall #89073
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: X509KeysStorageFlags.IgnorePrivateKeys #84267
    Future
  • Error in `ImmutableArray` initialization using C#12 collection literals #92022
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Exception thrown trying to deserialize a List<JsonNode> or JsonNode [] from a JSON array containing a null entry, e.g. [null]. #92902
  • Add initial Span<T> access to creation of ImmutableArray<T> #53154
    Future
  • Add an analyzer warning of erroneous usage of MaxResponseHeadersLength #75137
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Numerics Distance, Vector, Math Operations #83209
    Future
  • [wasm] Invoking async [JSExport] and [JSImport] kills the process on node, but works in browser #92713
    8.0.0
  • [maccatalyst] LLVM AOT build failure on iOS.Simulator.Aot-LLVM.Test #92827
    9.0.0
  • Network Traffic Statistics on Linux #91982
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ClientAsyncAuthenticateTest.ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails(clientProtocol: Tls12, serverProtocol: Ssl3, expectedException: typeof(System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException)) #68476
    Future
  • System.Net.Security.Tests - Helix timeout on Mono #76019
    Future
  • JIT: Addressing mode is not recognized properly #92861
    9.0.0
  • Dereference of NULL pointer #92858
  • [API Proposal]: Suggestion for adding another argument to IServiceProvider.GetService() for a more control over lookup #91638
    Future
  • [browser] __arg_return.ToJS(__retVal); is generated twice in JSExport #92400
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Authentication failed because the remote party sent a TLS alert 'UserCanceled' #92669
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration: SYSLIB0012 Assembly.CodeBase/EscapedCodeBase is obsolete #92752

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Use intended ports when running DevServer #92913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #92912
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement LoadAndReplicateToVector64x* and LoadAndReplicateToVector128x* APIs #92909
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock::bbJumpKind private #92908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Use intended ports when running `DevServer` #92906
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Cleanup iOS scenarios post HybridGlobalization scenario addition #92904
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI: Don't trigger runtime pipelines on perf pipeline only changes #92903
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Merge CoreCLR-based official builds legs into one leg per platform #92901
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • This vectorizes TensorPrimitives.Log2 #92897
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono] Reenable MSVC warnings #92895
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [infra] Disable failing test on tvos with Native AOT #92893
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser][nodejs] keep runtime alive for JSExport calls #92890
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Implement overrides for Span and ReadOnlySpan on SslStream #92889
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Remove duplicated marshaling of return value for JSExport #92886
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Arm64 SIMD regs are now zeroed with movi instead of eor #92882
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix AOT for projects with space in path/name #92880
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix zero/sign extend casts on arm64 #92875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Disable CodeQL in superpmi-collect pipeline #92872
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #92806
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Remove 'tracing' from Native AOT PR runs #92825
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][android] Add Android linux-arm64 workload definitions #92899
    area-Build-mono
  • Update owner list #92900
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline - fix blazor_scenarios run for hybrid globalization #92898
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [wasm] Set InstallV8ForTests=true only for windows/linux #92896
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Add linux-arm64 net8 workload definitions #92892
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix build of IJW test after VS upgrade #92878
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Disable MetricsSupport feature by default #92696
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][nodejs] keep runtime alive for JSExport calls #92871
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Ensure the adapter name 100% matching when parsing proc/net/dev #92187
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Remove duplicated marshaling of return value for JSExport #92403
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Only emit pshufb when ssse3 is enabled. #92842
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update intellisense.targets #92868
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [RISC-V] Fix target type unsignedness detection in genFloatToIntCast() #92694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Check DotNetFinalVersionKind when setting WorkloadVersionSuffix #91792
    area-Infrastructure, needs-area-label
  • [llvm] Fix spilling of valuetypes to the stack if they are passed by … #92658
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

Updated

  • Minimal ILGenerator implementation for new AssemblyBuilder.Save #92846
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • runtime-wasm-perf: add triggers for PRs #92799
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Merge stores #92852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions #92029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* APIs #92855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Start new per-host queue when an async over sync Dns call is cancelled #92862
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Use `add_linker_options` and `target_linker_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up the crossgen2_publish project and local/live packs references #92826
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI test #92354
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #92864
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • SPMI: Simplify and improve reporting of context information #92824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support passing negative/positive numbers to methods. #92754
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Apple mobile template allows passing process arguments to the runtime #92772
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of object scheme #92753
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][jit] Fuse SIMD extract and insert on arm64 #92714
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser][MT] running tests in a "sidecar" thread #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add analyzer support for inline array access #92736
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve throughput / allocations of JsonNode.GetPath #92284
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] Having space in path fails builds #92399
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Move Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetAppHost off of pkgproj #92621
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Update package description used types for System.IO.Hashing #92859
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1202 should be a warning and not an error to prevent breaking extant libaries #35811
  • [8.0.100-rc.2] Potential for incompatibility between Razor Tooling in Visual Studio and the .NET SDK #35810
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • Option to Set DOTNET_ROOT in CreateAppHost #35800

PullRequests

Created

  • SDK resolver perf: Optimize EnvironmentProvider.SearchPaths #35807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • SDK resolver perf: Cache current process path #35805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 21.3.0 in /eng/dependabot #35804
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 21.3.0 in /eng/dependabot #35803
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • branding update for 8.0.2xx #35661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable IDE0200 "Lambda expression can be removed" warning #35797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2281904 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: reuse HTTP connections more. #35754
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • Parse -d command differently based on position #35492
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Pass failure message reported from from getApplyUpdateCapabilities in WASM to dotnet watch #35755
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow Worker SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • ComputeDotnetBaseImageTag: handle rtm and servicing channels. #35775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Detect correctly multitargeted apps for trim/AOT/single-file warnings #35767
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Prefer spans over interfaces in overload resolution #7276
    Likely Never

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: replace conversion rule for types that implement IEnumerable #7570

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Avoid completion of non-updated symbols #70212
  • IDE0241 (Unnecessary nullable directive) reported inside unreachable #if block + not reported in others #70210
  • Convert to Raw String changes significant line endings #70209
  • IFieldSymbol.AssociatedSymbol should return the IParameterSymbol of the primary constructor parameter, if the field is a capture #70208
  • Passing the method back into `DefaultParameterValue` crashes #70206
    17.9

Closed

  • public API for roslyn features to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #69111
  • Adding .editorconfig as a `<Compile>` item results in Roslyn exceptions that propagate through the project system #70134
  • Disallow `RequiresLocationAttribute` in more places in source? #70011
    17.8
  • Proposal: Add "effective" severity for rules in SARIF v2 logs #67365
  • Csc is slow when processing inheritance chain of generic types #70169
    17.8
  • Exception and several gold bars when using relational pattern on pointer type #70048
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Followup fix-all changes to report operation progress in code actions (including cancellation). #70213
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Followup fix-all changes to report operation progress in code actions. #70211
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ask for source generated state up front when getting the compile time solution #70205
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2281126 #70204

Merged

  • Update default razor project cache file name #70156
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement support in the LSIF generator for logging to stderr #70067
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Additional tests for 'use collection expression'. #70207
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets: Follow user's preferred modifier order for type declaration snippets #70079
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update 'use collection expression' analyzer/fixer to support conversion when a capacity argument is passed. #70193
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70146
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Handle constant `null`s in pointer pattern matching #70113
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, untriaged, Next
  • Delpoy ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler with compiler #70203
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Collection expressions: update rules for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • fix missing space for numeric token #70135 #70202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, 17.8
  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PR for testing purposes #70174
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use applicable EnsureCapacity() when length is known #70181
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Add ReferenceOutputAssembly="false" to language server dlls we don't ship #70195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Global prefix to VBCSCompiler mutex to make it visible on nix systems #70189
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Remove newly doc'd rules #69259
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #70131
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] The default reconnect display does not appear after an enhanced navigation occurs #51083
  • [Blazor] Interactive server components can't receive Blazor endpoint updates during circuit reconnection #51082
  • BlazorWeb, require button names to have a matching code-behind variable. #51081
  • [Blazor] Interactive root component operations may exceed default SignalR message size #51080
  • [Blazor] Allow an unbounded number of interactive server components to exist in the same page #51075
  • Perf regression: endpoint #51074
  • [Blazor] Guarantee that interactive root component parameter updates originate from the correct source #51073
  • Form post failed to bind to Uri property in Blazor web app #51072
  • Blazor ASP.NET Core Hosted on Azure : error with JwtBearer #51071
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, mvc #51058
  • Cannot use Blazor 8 RC1 wasm on GitHub pages #51057

Closed

  • Upload files to a minimal API endpoint in .NET 8 #50968
  • Quarantine VariableMultipleStreamsInSequence_Success-500-True #43409
    Test failures
  • Flaky test - RouteTableFactoryTests.CanCacheRouteTable #36888
    8.0
  • New blazor wasm hosted project add container orchestrator support debugging doesn't work. #51038
  • NotFound RenderFragment ignore in .Net 8 Blazor Web App? #51044
  • [Blazor] Improvements to how SSR'd components are activated for interactivity #50849
    8.0
  • Minimal API - IFormCollection, IFormFileCollection and IFormFile throw "Invalid anti-forgery token found when reading parameter..." #51052
  • IApplicationBuilder.Map with pathMatch can not find route like it does in .net7 #50984

PullRequests

Created

  • Test-fixed reactions #51079
    area-infrastructure
  • Add DateOnly to Docs #51045 #51078
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51067
    feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Rename bootstrap icons that are used in templates #51060
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #51059
    area-blazor
  • Update AspNetCore.sln #51056
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix typo #51077
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK version #51069
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix Blazor WebAssembly PWA empty template #51032
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Delete eng/BeforeTargetFrameworkInference.targets #50928
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix failing Kestrel test due to Pings #51034
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Use renamed Extensions package #51070
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • [Form data mapping] Support for mapping URIs from form data #51019
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2281615 #50997
    area-mvc
  • Push history entry after enhanced submit with method=get #51013
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0
  • Add SERVER_NAME variable to IISUrlRewrite #51020
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Diagnostics Repo Engineering Summary #3884
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle log messages with duplicate placeholders and null args #4284

Merged

  • Remove the symstore dependency from Microsoft.Diagnostics.DebugServices #4279
  • Improve dotnet-dsrouter log levels and info. #4199
    ds-router, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Add the "crashinfo" command for NativeAOT. #4125

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [ManualMauiTests] Editor font attributes do not seem to take affect #17785
  • [ManualMauiTests] <Keyboard> on Editor does not appear to have any effect #17784
  • [ManualMauiTests] Pasting long text when the editor has a max length does nothing #17783
  • [ManualMauiTests] New text in the Editor character spacing test sometimes uses the previous spacing #17782
  • [Recipes] The cancel/clear search button does not disappear #17781
  • InputView MaxLengthProperty appears to be declared incorrectly #17780
  • [Android] ToShortTimeString() missing space between time and AM/PM on API 34 #17779
  • Calling SetBinding after setting a constant value crashes #17776
    .NET 8 GA
  • Crash when changing mainpage #17769
  • Clicking Editor in iOS creates an abnormal/undesirable "Done" bar above Touch Screen Keyboard, while clicking Entry does not cause this (correct function) #17768

Closed

  • NRE in HideSoftInputOnTappedChangedManager.UpdateFocusForView #17681
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Maui WebAuthenticator returns back from apple signin: An error was encountered while handling the remote login #17585
  • Can build full screen apps in Windows/Android easily but no method for iOS works #17767

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [net8.0] Merge main net8 #17777
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17773
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17772
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Make ALL template warnings show up as test errors (not just C# warnings), and produce more diagnostic artifacts #17637
    area/templates 📄
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Update dependecies for RC2 #17743
  • dependabot group fix for Android ecosystem - added missing prefixes #17770
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17749
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Don't run hide on tapped code if window is null #17758
    platform/android 🤖, area/keyboard

Updated

  • Fix some of the false GC test failures in Debug mode #17596
  • Make sure to account for a null AppWindow #17746
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Run template tests run in parallel to save 15min of run time #17672
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (1) #17669
    community ✨
  • Correctly expand rows/columns when grid padding #17750
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • Fixed Path size calculations #17722
    area/drawing ✏️, do-not-merge
  • Improves performance on SetterSpecificity and SetterSpecificityList #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add an expected result parameter to AssertQuery #31934
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite how to open from exists stream #31928

Closed

  • SaveChanges fails for model with owned type iff Update was called and using Sqlite #31014
    8.0.0
  • Is there a way to alter the DbContext configuration after AddDbContext has been called? #31905
  • Inspect the contents of a migration bundle and view generated SQL #31844
  • EF not generating SQL query correctly on fields that have conversion #31817
  • Upgrade 7.0.10 -> 7.0.11 #31906
  • Generate migrations bundle EF core 7 in Dockerfile : ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Length cannot be less than zero #31864

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Cosmos: persist non-shadow int keys on owned entity types #31933
  • [release/8.0] Make Contains work again over hierarchyid #31930
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Respect the difference between null/empty for owned collections mapped to JSON #31831
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0
  • [TEST ONLY] Check if tests have any results rather than looking at entry count #31922
  • Calculate sentinel value inside RuntimeProperty #31923
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Support BigInteger, Int128 & UInt128 #31778
  • [release/8.0] Validate single discriminator values #31916
    Servicing-consider
